feed.title: Ben’s Website
feed.subtitle: This is my personal website. It is a work in progress but live for viewers like you.

entry.title: I got an Internship
entry.content: I was able to get an internship this summer. Its at a startup called rMark Bio. The company uses AI to try and bring together partners in the bio tech and pharma industries for collaboration. So far I have written an API unit test suite for one of their APIs using the Jest testing frame work. Through this I have become familiar with Node.js and increased my fluency with Git. I’m excited to see what else I can get done this summer!

I’m excited to see what else I can get done this summer!

entry.title: My first Post!
entry.content: Working on my new Website and this is the first post. CS update: Trying to find an internship, hope it works out!!
